leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 天文-时间域与瞬变检测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 去噪→检测→分类→告警→调度

queries: [WEB] astronomy light curve classification benchmark github
[WEB] astronomical time series benchmark datasets github

tools.name: ActSNClass
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for photometric supernova classification
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing active learning strategies specifically for the classification of supernova photometric light curves, aiming to optimize training data selection.

tools.name: HOPS
tools.one_line_profile: Software for single-object photometry and exoplanet light-curve modelling
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly software package designed for analyzing astronomical data, specifically focusing on photometry and modelling light curves of exoplanets.

tools.name: xkn
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for computing kilonova light curves
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework dedicated to the computation and modeling of light curves associated with kilonova events.

tools.name: wise_light_curves
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to download and explore WISE mission light curves
tools.detailed_description: A Python package facilitating the retrieval and exploration of light curve data from the WISE (Wide-field Infrared Survey Explorer) mission.

tools.name: pgmuvi
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian processes for inference on multi-wavelength light curves
tools.detailed_description: A Python library utilizing Gaussian processes to perform inference on astronomical light curves across multiple wavelengths.

tools.name: dia_pipe
tools.one_line_profile: Difference Image Analysis pipeline for LSST DESC
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Difference Image Analysis (DIA) built upon the LSST DM Science Pipelines, developed for the Dark Energy Science Collaboration (DESC) data challenges.

tools.name: elasticc
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics and configuration for LSST ELAsTiCC challenge
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing settings, configurations, and metrics for the Extended LSST Astronomical Time Series Classification Challenge (ELAsTiCC), serving as a benchmark tool.

tools.name: plasticc-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Starter kit for LSST PLAsTiCC challenge
tools.detailed_description: The official starter kit for the Photometric LSST Astronomical Time-series Classification Challenge (PLAsTiCC), providing tools and baselines for participants.

tools.name: snmachine
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning code for photometric supernova classification
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning library designed for the photometric classification of supernovae, developed within the LSST DESC context.

tools.name: AVOCADO
tools.one_line_profile: R package for monitoring vegetation change
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for monitoring vegetation changes in a continuous way, applicable in earth observation and ecology.

tools.name: allesfitter
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for light curve and radial velocity modelling
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive wrapper package integrating ellc, dynesty, emcee, and celerite for flexible modelling of photometric light curves and radial velocity data.

tools.name: MultimodalUniverse
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale Multimodal Dataset of Astronomical Data
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale multimodal dataset designed for astronomical research, facilitating the development of machine learning models for astronomy.

tools.name: SARS-CoV2-mRNA-Assemblies
tools.one_line_profile: Assemblies of putative SARS-CoV2 spike-encoding mRNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: A dataset providing experimental sequence information and assemblies for the RNA components of COVID-19 vaccines (Moderna and Pfizer/BioNTech).

tools.name: TESS_Gaia_Light_Curve
tools.one_line_profile: TESS FFI light curves fitted with effective PSF
tools.detailed_description: Code and pipeline to generate TESS Full Frame Image (FFI) light curves, fitted with effective PSF and decontaminated using Gaia DR3 data.

tools.name: TSB-UAD
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end benchmark suite for univariate time-series anomaly detection
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating time-series anomaly detection algorithms, featuring datasets from multiple domains including space science (NASA) and providing a unified interface for model comparison.

tools.name: VegasAfterglow
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance framework for GRB afterglow modeling and light curve generation
tools.detailed_description: A C++ framework with Python bindings for modeling Gamma-Ray Burst (GRB) afterglows, featuring fast multi-wavelength light curve generation, MCMC parameter inference, and advanced physics models for shock dynamics and radiation.

tools.name: eleanor
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for extracting light curves from TESS Full Frame Images
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to extract light curves from the TESS Full Frame Images (FFIs), enabling researchers to obtain time-series photometry for stars not included in the standard 2-minute cadence targets.

tools.name: ALeRCE Client
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for accessing the ALeRCE astronomical alert broker
tools.detailed_description: The official Python client for interacting with the ALeRCE (Automatic Learning for the Rapid Classification of Events) broker, facilitating access to astronomical alerts, light curves, and classification results.

tools.name: VAST Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Radio transient detection pipeline for the ASKAP VAST survey
tools.detailed_description: The processing pipeline for the Variables and Slow Transients (VAST) survey on the Australian Square Kilometre Array Pathfinder (ASKAP), designed to detect and monitor radio transients.

tools.name: Avocado (Genomics)
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed variant caller for genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A distributed variant caller built on top of the ADAM genomics processing engine and Apache Spark, designed for scalable processing of high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: taufit
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient AGN light curve modeling and parameter estimation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for modeling Active Galactic Nuclei (AGN) light curves using the Damped Random Walk (DRW) model, leveraging the celerite library for efficient Gaussian Process regression and parameter estimation.

tools.name: AltaiPony
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for finding flares in Kepler and TESS light curves
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to de-trend light curves and detect stellar flares in data from Kepler, K2, and TESS missions.

tools.name: PyTransit
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and easy exoplanet transit light curve modelling
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for high-performance exoplanet transit light curve modelling, offering multiple transit models and GPU acceleration.

tools.name: Fulu
tools.one_line_profile: Supernova light curve approximation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for approximating and augmenting supernova light curves using various machine learning methods (Gaussian Processes, Normalizing Flows, etc.).

tools.name: Avocado
tools.one_line_profile: Photometric classification of astronomical transients and variables
tools.detailed_description: A package for photometric classification of astronomical transients and variables, particularly designed for handling biased spectroscopic samples and data augmentation.

tools.name: light-curve
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for time-series feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Rust packages for extracting features from light curves and other time-series data, optimized for performance.

tools.name: light-curve-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for light-curve feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: Python bindings for the light-curve Rust library, enabling efficient feature extraction from astronomical light curves in Python environments.

tools.name: batman
tools.one_line_profile: Fast transit light curve models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating exoplanet transit light curves, known for its speed and flexibility in handling limb darkening.

tools.name: ELISa
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for modeling light and radial velocity curves of eclipsing binaries
tools.detailed_description: ELISa (Eclipsing binary Learning and Interactive System) is a Python-based tool designed for efficient modeling of light and radial velocity curves of eclipsing binaries. It balances computational speed and accuracy, offering modular, cross-platform usability and built-in optimization methods like least squares and MCMC for parameter determination.

tools.name: ellc
tools.one_line_profile: Light curve model for transiting exoplanets and eclipsing binary stars
tools.detailed_description: A light curve model for transiting exoplanets and eclipsing binary stars. It allows for the simulation and analysis of light curves, supporting various stellar and planetary parameters.

tools.name: pycheops
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis library for light curves from the ESA Cheops mission
tools.detailed_description: A Python module specifically designed for the analysis of light curves obtained from the ESA Cheops mission, facilitating data processing and scientific inference.

tools.name: feets
tools.one_line_profile: Feature extractor for time series data in astronomy
tools.detailed_description: feets (feATURE eXTRACTOR FOR tIME sERIES) is a library designed to extract various statistical and morphological features from time series data, particularly astronomical light curves.

tools.name: everest
tools.one_line_profile: De-trending pipeline for K2 light curves
tools.detailed_description: EVEREST (EPIC Variability Extraction and Removal for Exoplanet Science Targets) is a pipeline for de-trending K2 light curves to remove instrumental noise and recover stellar variability.

tools.name: planetplanet
tools.one_line_profile: General photodynamical code for exoplanet light curves
tools.detailed_description: A general photodynamical code designed to model exoplanet light curves, accounting for planet-planet interactions and other dynamical effects.

tools.name: starry_process
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable Gaussian processes for stellar light curves
tools.detailed_description: A library for modeling stellar light curves using interpretable Gaussian processes, allowing for the inference of surface features and variability.

tools.name: sncosmo
tools.one_line_profile: Library for supernova cosmology analysis and modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for supernova cosmology, providing tools for light curve simulation, fitting, and cosmological parameter estimation.

tools.name: SuperNNova
tools.one_line_profile: Photometric classification for supernovae using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework for photometric classification of supernovae using deep learning (neural networks), supporting training, evaluation, and interpretation.

tools.name: pylightcurve
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for modeling and analyzing exoplanet transit light curves
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package designed for the modeling and analysis of exoplanet transit light curves. It provides functionalities for simulating transits, fitting models to observational data, and extracting planetary parameters, widely used in exoplanetary science.

tools.name: VBBinaryLensing
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for microlensing light curve calculations
tools.detailed_description: A specialized C++ library for the calculation of gravitational microlensing light curves, specifically focusing on binary lens systems. It utilizes the contour integration method (VBB) to provide accurate magnification calculations for analyzing microlensing events.

tools.name: fastdup
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for rapid image/video dataset quality control and deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A powerful tool for unsupervised image and video data curation. It enables researchers to identify duplicates, anomalies, and outliers in large visual datasets without labels, significantly improving data quality for computer vision tasks in scientific imaging.

tools.name: astrobase
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for light curve analysis and variable star astronomy
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing tools for analyzing astronomical light curves and variable stars. It includes modules for period finding, light curve phasing, and other time-series analysis tasks essential for time-domain astronomy.

tools.name: Astronet-Triage
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network model for TESS light curve triage
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation designed to triage light curves from the TESS (Transiting Exoplanet Survey Satellite) mission. It automates the identification of promising exoplanet candidates by filtering out false positives and noise.
